document_data.mainbody:
Turtleback soup was one of the more notable dishes from the city of Velen in the nation of Tethyr.
A soup of green color and distinctly briny taste, served with sliced cucumber.
As of the late 14 century DR, turtleback soup could be found on Blackthorns Brews menu, a festhall on the Captains Cliff in Velen. The dish was mentioned among other notable foods included in Volothamp Geddarms published guide to Amn and Tethyr.
